p: The fresh flowers of Fagopyrum esculentum and Fagopyrum tataricum were collected in Jintang Country (Chengdu, Sichuan Province, China) and the flowers of Fagopyrum cymosum were collected on Longquan Mountain (Chengdu, Sichuan Province, China) in autumn 2016, labeled and stored in sealed plastic bags at 4 Â°C. The taxonomical identification of the plant materials were done by Prof. Gang Zhao of Chengdu University, where the voucher specimens (CCPC-20161001, CCPC-20161002 and CCPC-20161003) of the plants were deposited.
